oai_dc:dc.dc:title: U-Compare Type system
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The resource constitues of a hierarchically-structured system of data types, which is intended to be suitable for describing the inputs and output annotation types of a wide range of natural language processing applications which operate within the UIMA Framework. It is being developed in conjunction with the U-Compare Workbench, but can be used as the base type system for other UIMA components and workflows, to help to ensure greater interoperability.
